GK16visa07cu:1: iha hi prathamataḥ kāvye doṣaguṇarītyalaṅkārāṇāmavasthitikramo daśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2: saṃprati ke ta ityapekṣāyāmuddeśakramaprāptānāṃ doṣaṇāṃ svarūpamāha---
GK16visa07cu:6: iha hi prathamataḥ prathamaparicchede doṣānāmavasthitikramo 'vasthitiprakāro darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:11: atra ca rītyalaṅkārāṇāmiti pāṭhastu uddeśavyutkrameṇa lekhakapramādaparamparayaiveti lakṣyate /
GK16visa07cu:14: (lo, a) kāvyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya doṣān nirūpayitukāmaḥ tatprastāvaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:36: pade tadaṃśe vākyer'the saṃbhavanti rase 'pi yat // VisSd_7.1 //
GK16visa07cu:40: te punariti--te doṣāḥ padatadaṃśādipañcake sthitā yasmāt vākyārthabhūtasyāsvādasyāpakarṣakāraṇāni tasmāt pañca prakārāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:51: aprayuktatā ityatra dvandvottarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratyekamabhisambandhāt duḥ śravatvādaya eva doṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:52: etadādyavimṛṣṭavidheyāśabhāvāntāḥ trayodaśa doṣāḥ padavākyayoḥ pade vākye 'pi sambhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:55: nirarthakatvamasamarthatvaṃ cyutasaṃskāratā ceti doṣatrayaṃ paraṃ kevalaṃ pade natu vākye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:58: (lo, ī) tatra ke doṣāḥ kiniṣṭā ityata āha--duḥ śraveti /
GK16visa07cu:70: etacca vīrabībhatsaraudrān rasān vihāya iti bodhyam, teṣu tasyānuguṇatvādeva /
GK16visa07cu:72: samagrapadavyāpakatve tu pratikūlavarṇatvadoṣa eva ityadi boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:90: tatra vrīḍājugupsayoḥ kārakatvaṃ maṅgalasya ca jñāpakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:96: (vi, cha) dṛptārīti---sādhanaṃ senā ca cārthaḥ prākaraṇikatvāt anekārthasya sādhanaśabdasya vācyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:97: puṃvyañjanarūpastvartho vyaṅgyaḥ śrotṝṇāṃ vrīḍājanakaḥ; natu vrīḍāvyañjakaḥ tadapratīteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:103: he tanvi ! tava vināśe adarśane sati tadā mama duḥ khotpādanāya vāyuḥ śanaiḥ mandaṃ prasasāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:112: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt kameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:122: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt krameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:135: tena idānīntanānekakavibhiḥ prācīnaikakavinā vāsyā'dare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:136: evañca “padmān hi me prāvṛṣi khañjarīṭān “iti naiṣadhakṛtā prācīnaikakavinā ādare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:137: kāvyavyatirikte bhāṣāmātre tadādare tu adoṣa eva, ityataḥ nānuśāsanaprāmāṇyam /
GK16visa07cu:157: yogaśastra eva na tu loke arthaśāstre vā /
GK16visa07cu:161: te ca manasi varttamānāḥ puruṣe apadiśyante iti /
GK16visa07cu:162: kiñcaivaṃ vaktṛboddhavyayoḥ śāstrānabhijñatvabodhādiṃ vinā doṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:165: “āśaīḥ paramparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru” /
GK16visa07cu:166: atra vandyāmiti kiṃ bandībhūtāyāmuta vandanīyāmiti saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:176: vandyāmiti--asya saptamyantatvena dvitīyāntatvena ca sambhavāt prakaraṇābhāvena vinigamanābhāvāt sandehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:182: aśaktikṛtaṃ kaverasāmarthyamātreṇa kṛtaṃ na tu rūḍhiprayojanayoḥ anyatareṇa kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:191: darśitaṃ hi sthāne sthāne lakṣyārthāteśayaḥ prayojanamiti cet, na /
GK16visa07cu:194: prakṛte nirjitatve lakṣyārthe mukhaniṣṭhaśobhājanyatvameva vivakṣito yogaścaraṇāghāte mukhyārthe cālīke tacchobhābhāvāt tajjanyatvanirjitatvaṃ na pratīyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:195: tataśca tadapratītyā asyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ kaviprayogānarhatvajñānena aśraddheyatvāt lakṣyārthatiśayaḥ prayojanaṃ na pratīyate eva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:203: śambaraśabdo daitye prasiddhaḥ, iha tu jale nihatārthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:207: yamunāyāḥ śambaraṃ jalam ambaram ākāśaṃ vyatānīt vyāptamityarthaḥ “ambu śambum” iti koṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:210: atra tu prasiddhivaśāt liṅgānanusandhāne 'pi padamātreṇaiva prathamataḥ tadupasthityavalambanāt liṅgasyānvayasya ca bodhāttu paścādeva jalapratīteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:219: atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,
GK16visa07cu:220: āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ śaktibhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:222: tadapekṣyā āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:223: ḍudāñ dāne iti sāmānyataḥ śaktidarśanāttu śaktibhramaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:224: neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:225: ato neyārthatvalakṣaṇe śaktibhramābhāve sati iti viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /
GK16visa07cu:226: avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /
GK16visa07cu:229: parantu iyaṃ lakṣaṇā na neyārtho, nāpi kaviprayogārheti bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:230: nirthakādidoṣapatrayasya tu vākyadoṣatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tadapāsyam /
GK16visa07cu:240: (vi, tha) yathā vā--“dinaṃ me tvayi saṃprāpte dhvāntacchannāpi yāminī /
GK16visa07cu:242: dhvāntacchannāpīti apikāreṇa dhvāntacchannatvaviparītabodhanāt prakāśamayatvasyaiva tadviparītabodhāt na tu dinatvasya /
GK16visa07cu:255: kliṣṭatvamiti---vyavadhānaṃ ca dvidhā, kvacidanvitānvayavaśena viśeṣāpratītau kālikavyavadhānam /
GK16visa07cu:261: atra kṣīrodajā lakṣmīstasyā vasatiḥ padmaṃ tasya janmabhuvo jalāni /
GK16visa07cu:273: atreti---bhavasya patnītyarthe sādhitasya bhavānīśabdasya arthena patiśabdārthasya anvayavaśāt caitrasya bhāryāyāḥ patirityatra iva upapatipratītyānindā /
GK16visa07cu:275: (lo, au) bhavānīśabdo bhavasya patnītyarthe nadādau ānapratyayāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:280: atra vṛthātvaṃ vidheyam, tacca samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratītikṛt /
GK16visa07cu:284: sa ca samabhivyāhārapratītisākṣiko na tu gata eva /
GK16visa07cu:285: tathā hi prāṅnirddiṣṭavidheyakaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vinā samāsāntare vidheyasya pāte,
GK16visa07cu:286: asamāse tu uddeśyāt pūrvavidheyasya pāte tathātvam /
GK16visa07cu:291: tasyedānīṃ vṛthātvamityataḥ ucchūnatve uddeśye vṛthātva vidheyam /
GK16visa07cu:292: taccātra karmadhārayasamāsagatatvenāvimṛṣṭamityarthaḥ bahuvrīhisamāse prāṅnirddiṣṭaṃ vidheyaṃ tu vidheyatayaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:294: “nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara“ityatra rāge nirmṛṣṭatvasya citragurityatra gavicitratvasya ca vidheyasya vidheyatayaiva sārvalaukikī pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:295: na tu karmadhāraye vidheyapāte tadavimarśa iti satyam /
GK16visa07cu:298: “ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya“ityatra bāṇe uddeśye 'nvayi ṣaṣṭhatvaṃ vidheyamavimṛṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:299: yatra tūddeśyatāvacchedake vidheyamanveti tatra vidheyatayaiva pratīteḥ ānubhāvikatvānna doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:300: yathā“eṣvayamatyanvapaṇḍita“ityatra atyantasya vidheyasya uddeśyatāvacchedake pāṇḍitye evānvayo vidheyatayaiva pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:301: evaṃ“nitāntasundarīkāntā“ityatrāpi saundarye 'nvitasya nitāntatvasya eva---“anirddayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ kathaṃ /
GK16visa07cu:302: kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
GK16visa07cu:304: tathā ca prakṛte 'pi ucchūnatvena uddeśyatāvacchedakenānvitasya vṛthātvasya kathamavimṛṣṭatvam. ucchūnabhuje vṛthātvasya tu kiṃpadenaiva uktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:305: yattu kāvyaprakāśakṛtā asyaiva ślokasya prathamacaraṇe“nyakkāro hyayameva me yadahayaḥ';
GK16visa07cu:307: atra caraṇe ucchūnatvamātraṃ cānuvādyaṃ natu vṛthātvaviśeṣitam“ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:311: tathā hi svargaviluṇṭhane ucchūnatvameva janyate natu tad vṛthātvaṃ vṛthātvaviśeṣitamucchūnatvaṃ vā /
GK16visa07cu:313: ato viluṇṭhanasya janakatāsambandhena vṛthocchūnatve 'nanvayādabhavanmatayogadoṣa eva darśitaḥ na cābhavanmatadoṣasya vākyamātragāmitvameva tenoktaṃ kathaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:320: ayamāśayaḥ-- tatpuruṣasamāse uttarapadasyaiva prādhānyāt vṛtheti pūrvapadasya vidheyasya prādhānyenānirddeśādavimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśo doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:322: iha vakturdaśamukhasyāyamāśayaḥ--purā mama bhujānāṃ yad ucchūnatvaṃ sthitaṃ taditānīṃ vṛthābhūtamiti /
GK16visa07cu:323: evaṃ vidheyatvena vivabhitasya vṛthātvasya samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:324: tena ca pūrvato bhujānāmucchūnatvasya vṛthātvābhāvād bhujānāmapakarṣa eva pratīyate na bhujavikṣepaṇotkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:334: atra rāmasambandhādevāyamahaṅkāra ityato rāmasambandhabodhikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpuruṣe lopāt rāmasambandhasya vidheyasāvimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:340: na khalu tasya kevalasya mukhyatā kintu rāmasambandhina ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:346: “yatra te patati subhru ! kaṭākṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya” /
GK16visa07cu:350: (vi, pha) yathā veti---atra samudraparyyantatvasya vidheyasya samāse 'vimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:355: ṣaṣṭha iti--atra utprekṣāviṣayatvena vivakṣitasya ṣaṣṭapadasya tatpuruṣasamāse pūrvānikṣepo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:365: tathā ca mocanābhāvasya evātra vidheyatvāt asamāsenaiva tathātvaṃ bodhayitumucitamityāha---vidheyatvamevocitamiti /
GK16visa07cu:366: samāse tu tadbhannatvasya eva pratītyā paryyudāsatvameva tatra tu vidheyasya pratīṣedho na pratīyate itadyatastasyāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:374: jugopātmānamatrasta ityādau iva vidheḥ prādhānya yatra nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:375: navajaladhara ityādisamanantaroktodāharaṇavat yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ kiyayā kaṇṭhoktayā adhyāhāryyayā vā astibhavatyādirūpayā paryyudāsatāpātātparyyudāsayogakṣemāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:379: uktodāharaṇo tu tatpuruṣasamāse guṇībhāve nañaḥ paryudāsatayā niṣedhasya vidheyatayānavagamaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:384: pratiyoginastvaprādhānyaṃ tādṛśasthale nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvam ityatra samvādamāha---aprādhānyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:386: pratiṣedhe nañarthe 'samāsavaśāt pradhānatā, vidheyatā pratīyate iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:387: tathātvaṃ kīdṛśaprayogamityatrāha---kriyayeti---na pacatītyādau ākhyātakriyayā saha samāsābhāvāt ;
GK16visa07cu:389: tathā ca asamāse yatra nañ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:390: ata evātra muktakriyayā nañaḥ sāhitye 'pi asamāsābhāvāt na prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16visa07cu:392: amuktetyatra tu samāsāt na tathātvamityāha---uktodāharaṇe tviti /
GK16visa07cu:402: vidheyapratiyogibhūtābhāvasya pratiṣedhe naño 'pradhānatā samāsavaśāt apratīyamānavidheyatārūpāpradhānatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:407: na pacatītyatra uttaratra nañsattvāttu na paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:408: idamatrāvadheyam---pratiyogipadottaranañsattve samāsāsambhavāt yatrottaretyādinā samāsastha eva paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:410: na dṛptaniśācara ityatra pūrvapatitasyāpi nañaḥ paryyudāsatvāt yatrottaretyādeḥ pralāpatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:411: yadyapyasamāsasthasyāpi ghaṭo netyatra paryyudāsatvam asamāsasthasya kriyānvayinaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvamiti tu niyataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:412: samāse kṛdantakriyānvayino 'pi paryyudāsatvāt asamasteti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ samāse paryyudāsatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:417: atrātrastatādyanūdyātmagopanādyeva vidheyamiti nañaḥ paryudāsatayā guṇībhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:421: ityasya udāharaṇaṃ darśayati--jugopeti--evaṃ ca nañaḥ paryyudāsatve tadarthasya samāse vidheyatvāpratīteḥ ityāha /
GK16visa07cu:422: yukta ityatra vidhayasya nañarthasya avimarśa eveti sādhitam /
GK16visa07cu:429: nanu “aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ” “asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ” ityādivat “amuktā” ityatrāpi prasajyapratiṣedho bhavatīti ced ?
GK16visa07cu:431: atrāpi yadi bhojanādirūpakriyāṃśena nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāttadaiva tatra prasajyapratiṣedhatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyama,
GK16visa07cu:432: na ca tathā ; viśeṣyatayā pradhānena taddhojyārthena kartraṃśenaiva nañaḥ sambandhāt /
GK16visa07cu:438: yadi kriyāṃśe nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt tadaiva prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ syāt “kiyayā saha yatra naña“iti vacanāt /
GK16visa07cu:439: iha tu śrāddhabojanaśīlādayamanya iti kartraṃśenaiva sambandhāt nañaḥ paryyudāsatvameveti /
GK16visa07cu:450_1: pratītidarśanāt tad dṛṣṭāntena amuktetyatrāpi mocanābhāvarūpasya pratiṣedhasya vidheyasya
GK16visa07cu:453: akṣoddhetyanayorapi yadi bhajanadarśanakriyayornañarthasyānvayaḥ syāt tadaiva tathātvāpādanaṃ sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:454: tayoranvaya eva tatra netyāha--- na ca tatheti /
GK16visa07cu:456: karttari vihitābhyāṃ kṛtpratyayābhyāmupasthāpitena bhojirūpakartraṃśena ca sahaiva naño nañarthasya sambandhāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:459: kṛtpratyayena kartrupasthānāt śrāddhabhojī ityatra bhojanakarttaiva pratīyate ityatra samvādamāha--yadāhuḥ--śrāddhabhojaneti /
GK16visa07cu:460: atra kṛtpratyayādevaṃ darśanakarttāro rājadārā api pratīyante ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:461: tathā ca tayorapi śrāddhabhojibhinnasūryyadarśakabhinnatvam ityevaṃ paryyudāsa eva pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:462: tathā ca samāsasthatannañ--dṛṣṭāntenāpyamuktā ityatra samāsasthanañaḥ paryyudāsatvameva sidhyatīti manasikṛtya amuktetyatra bhojītyataḥ kiñcinmātraṃ valakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:468: iha tu bhāṣyakārādimatamāśritya kiyānvayāṃśāpekṣayā prasajyapratiṣedhārthasvīkāre 'pi amuktetyādau /
GK16visa07cu:471: “amuktā” ityatra tu kriyayaiva saha saṃbandha iti doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:478: na pacati na nidrāti ityanvaye kartturupasthāne 'pi nidrāpākakṛtyorevānvayāt atha niyamābhāve 'pi tātparyyavaśāt tatra karttaryyeva nañarthānvaya iti cenna /
GK16visa07cu:480: śrāddhābhojanaśīlānvaye tu śrāddhabhojanaśīlabhinna iti pratītau na kadacit bhojanakṛt api pratīyate ityato granthakṛtānavadhānādeva itthaṃ samādhānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:483: tathā ca śrāddhamātrabhojītyarthalābhe mātrārthavaśāt śrāddhabhojanaśīlalābha iti brūmaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:485: ete ca kliṣṭatvādayaḥ samāsagatā eva padadoṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:490: samāsagatā eveti natu asamāse 'pi padadoṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:492: anāsattyadhīnakliṣṭatve tu samāsasya evāsambhavāt padagatatvaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:493: viruddhamatikṛtaḥ padārthantarānvayenaiva duṣṭatvāt avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya cānuvādyavidheyārthakapadadvayaghaṭitatvāt vā samāsaṃ vinā padatvāsambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:498: (vi, śa) eṣāṃ trayodaśānāṃ padagatatvaṃ darśayitvā vākyagataṃ tu darśayitumārabhate /
GK16visa07cu:503: ataḥ śrutikaṭvādīnāṃ kvacit padāṃśaniṣṭatve 'pi bahuvyāpitvena vākyagatatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:522: atra pravṛttiśabdasya purīṣavyañjanayā, vāntaśabdasya ca udrīrṇavācakatayā jugupsā /
GK16visa07cu:526: atra kalalalauhityaṃ padmarāgaḥ, vakrābhirvāmābhiḥ, iti neyārthatā /
GK16visa07cu:534: lakṣitena padena ca padmarāgamaṇirucyate ityarthaḥ na ca pratyayānāṃ kṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvāt kathamatra tṛtīyayā padmārage karaṇatā bodhyate iti vācyam ,
GK16visa07cu:538: vastutastu vāmāvakrāpadayoḥ paryyāyaikyadarśanasya śaktibhramabījasya sattvāt atra avācakatvameva yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:542: atra dhammillasya śobhāṃ prekṣya kasya mānasaṃ na sajyatīti saṃbandhaḥ kliṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:551: atra cāyameva nyakkāra iti nyakkārasya vidheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:559: anuvādyamanuktvaiva na vidhayamudīrayet iti niyamāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:560: ata eva vahnimān parvata iti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:561: nanu vidheyapadasya pūrvanipātena doṣe padadoṣatvameva ucitamityata āha---racanā ceti
GK16visa07cu:565: tatra dharmmiṇamuddiśya sādyadharmmovidhīyate ityanusāreṇa prathamamanūdya vidheyo nyakkāraḥ paścānnirddiṣṭumucitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:567: ata eva śabdo 'nitya iti vaktavye 'nityaḥ śabda iti vacanena ca prāptaṃ nigrahasthānamāhuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:568: tathā hi kathamatra vākyadoṣa ityata āha---racaneti /
GK16visa07cu:569: padadvayasya viparītatāyāmeveti padaṃ nirddiśya paścānnyakkāra iti padasya ca paścānnirddeśyasya prathamanirddeśāt /
GK16visa07cu:571: vṛthocchūnairityatrāpi avasthānasattve pūrvamatra padadoṣatvamudāhṛtaṃ tatra nyakkāra ityādyanapekṣā granthagauravabhayāt /
GK16visa07cu:574_1: tacchabdasamānārthatayā pratipādyamānā idametadaḥ śabdā vidheyā eva bhavituṃ yuktāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:578: ya ānandayati asau samāgata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:580: yacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvapratipattaye pratipadyamānā idametadadaḥ śabdāḥ ityanena teṣāṃ sarvatra tacchabdābhidhānamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:582: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhai ! te” //
GK16visa07cu:594: “yaḥ sa te nayanānandakaraḥ subhru ! sa āgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:598: vidheyārthakasyādaḥ śabdasya uddeśyārthakāt yacchabdāt paranipāte 'pi sānnidhyavaśāt vidheyatvāpratītyā etaddeṣamudāharati---āvandayatīti /
GK16visa07cu:599: atra yaste netre ānandayati asau samāgata iti bodhe yacchabdārthe 'nuvādyo 'daḥ śabdārtho vidheyaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:600: tasyāvimarśaṃ grāhayitum adaḥ śabdasya vidheyataucityaṃ darśayati---yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:606: tathā ca tacchabda iva idametadadaḥ śabdā api ākāṅkṣāpūrakatvena vidheyārthakatayauva vidheyā bhavituṃ yuktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:613: yaḥ sa te iti yaḥ prasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:619: tathā sati teṣāṃ vidheyatvaṃ sphuṭamavagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:627: nirākāṅkṣatvagamakasyaiva ca vidheyatvāpratītiviṣayatvamityatastato nāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:642: “yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16visa07cu:647: ekasyaivopādāne tu nāyaṃ vicāra ityāha---yatra ca yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:652: yatpāpamarthāt svaniṣṭaṃ tadātmā jānāti ityarthaḥ--evaṃ yaṃ sarveti /
GK16visa07cu:670: kriyate tathā vālikāryam api sugrīveṇa karttavyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:677: sa ityanena yaḥ prakṛto rāmacandraḥ sa iti /
GK16visa07cu:678: tatra sa ityanena yaḥ sakalalokaprasiddhaḥ sarvajñātvādiguṇāviśiṣṭaḥ tādātmyāyātmana ekābhāvāpattaye /
GK16visa07cu:679: tāṃ yā tadguṇaviśiṣṭatayā anubhūtetyādiṣu yada ārthatvam /
GK16visa07cu:681: yatra ca yacchabdanikaṭasthitānāmapīdamādiśabdānāṃ bhinnaliṅgavibhaktitvaṃ tatrāpi nirākāṅkṣatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:688: yatra ya ādhārastadadhikāraṇamityatra iva idaṃ pade vidheyasya bhū,ṇasya liṅgam /
GK16visa07cu:690: yaḥ indurvibhāti tena pathikayoṣito dagdhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:701: “na me śamayitā ko 'pi mārasyetyuvi ! mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:703: atra yo 'sti, sa te bhārasya śamayiteti budhyate /
GK16visa07cu:708: he urvi ! me bhārasya śamayitā ko 'pi na, evaṃ mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:712: vyākhyātaṃ ca tacchabdārthāvagamaṃ vināpi yathoktabālakasattvasya yata iti uttaravākyagatatayā kāraṇahetutvāvagamād uttaravākyagatayacchabdasya tacchabdānapekṣaṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:713: kintu--- “ye nāma kecidiha naḥ prathayantyavajñāṃ jānanti te kimapi tān prati naiṣa yatnaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:714: utpatsyate 'sti mama ko 'pi samānadharmā kālo hyayaṃ niravadhirvipulā ca pṛthvī //
GK16visa07cu:715: iti yo bhavabhūterahaṅkāraślokaḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā yattadordvayoranupādānodāharaṇaṃ darśitaṃ tadevodāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:716: tatra utpatsyamānasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyāniścitatvāt yattadbhyāṃ sāmānyata eva ya utpatsyate taṃ prati yatna ityuktaucityāt /
GK16visa07cu:719: ityatraiko yacchabdaḥ sākāṅkṣa iti na vācyam,
GK16visa07cu:720: tathāhi---yadyadityanena kenacidrūpeṇa sthitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ vastu vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:724: (vi, jha) yacchabdasyottaravākyagatatve eva tacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvaṃ darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:726: tathāpi vīpsitayacchabdasthale ekayatpadākāṅkṣaiva ekatatpadena nivarttatām anyad yatpadaṃ tu sākāṅkṣamevasyāt /
GK16visa07cu:727: tathā ca---yad yad virahaduḥ khaṃ me tadityatra ekaṃ yatpadaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃsyāt ityāśaṅkya samādhatte--iti na vācyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:729: yena kenacit ityasyāyamabhiprāyo vīpsayā tāvat samastā vyaktaya upasthāpyante /
GK16visa07cu:730: tā vyaktaya eva tatpadena ca parāmarśa yadi vaktustātparyyaṃ tadā ekatatpadenaiva samastavyaktipāramarśāt yatpadadvayākāṅ kṣāpūraṇāt na tatpade vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:734: yadi vīpsitayatpadadvayena tadvyaktitvena eva upasthāpayituṃ vakātustātparyyaṃ tadā bhavatyeva tatpade 'pi vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:735: yathā “yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃ varā sā vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:736: “ityatra “yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarakṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namraṃmukī babhūta /
GK16visa07cu:744: tatra aprayuktasya vākyagatatve yathā--“sa pātu vo duścyavano bhāvukānāṃ paramparām /
GK16visa07cu:749: atra padadoṣānantaraṃ padāṃśadoṣāṇām uddeśyakamaprāptatve yeṣāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ padadoṣasajātīyatvena prathamaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:750: “nyakkāro hyayameva“ityādeśca padadoṣajātīyatve 'pi avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya viśeṣatvenaitat prastāva evodāharaṇam /
GK16visa07cu:758: (vi, ña) tadgaccha siddhyai kuru devakāryyamityatra iti śrutikaṭuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:768: anirddiṣṭakālakāḥ pratyayāḥ triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavantītyanusāsanāt traikālikakriyāsveva tasya sādhutvāt /
GK16visa07cu:770: kintu lakṣaṇīya eva sā lakṣaṇā na neyārthā /
GK16visa07cu:773: (lo, u) vijeya ityanena vijetuṃ śakya eva pratipādyate natu vijitatvam /
GK16visa07cu:782: atra vacaḥ śabdasya gīḥ śabdavācakatve neyārthātvam /
GK16visa07cu:788: na gīrvacaḥ śabdayordvayorapi vācyavācakatvena vākyabāṇatvarūpayogārthena devārthe kathaṃ śabdalakṣaṇeti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:789: bāṇaśabdapūrvavarttino gīḥ śabdasya parivṛttyakṣamatvāt vacobāṇaśabdena devābodhanāt /
GK16visa07cu:791: śaktisattvādeva naca deve lakṣaṇā kintu gīḥ śabdabodhasya ānubhavikatvāt,
GK16visa07cu:793: na caivaṃ gīḥ śabdo vāṇatvameva pratyetumucitam, na vākyabāṇatvamiti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:794: lakṣitagīḥ śabdenaikavākyabodhanāt tathā pratītiriti prapañcitamidamasmatkṛtakāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vastravaidūryacaraṇairiti neyārthodāharaṇe /
GK16visa07cu:801: (vi, ḍa) śareti pāṭha iti---tathā ca gīḥ śara iti na bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:806: tathā ca jalāśaya iti samudratvena rūpaemābodhakam /
GK16visa07cu:812: baḍaveti tenāśvānala iti na bhavati baḍavāgniriti tu bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:815: vacaṛ śabdasyeti---atra vacobāṇaśabdena gīrvāṇo vivakṣitaḥ uttarapadameva parivṛttiṃ na sahata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:820: nirarthakatvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca padamātragatatvenaila lakṣye saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:825: tathāvidhadoṣāvahaṃ hi ko nāma mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punarabhidadhyāt /
GK16visa07cu:831: atra hantīti gamanārthe paṭhitamapi na tatra samartham /
GK16visa07cu:835: śaktisattve 'pi jaṅghāpaddhatirityādau pratyayaviśeṣopapadaviśeṣasahakāreṇaiva gatismāraṇasamarthaṃ na svata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:836: punaḥ punaḥ gamyate, padbhyāṃ gamyate, iti hi jaṅghāpaddhatipadayorvyutpattiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:846: kanakaśilānibhaṃ kirātamūrttestrilocanasya vakṣo bhujābhyām ājaghne ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:852: nanvatra “ājadhne” iti padasya svato na duṣṭatā,
GK16visa07cu:853: api tu padāntarāpekṣayaiva ityasya vākyadoṣatā ? maivam /
GK16visa07cu:865: tathā yathehātmanepadasya parivṛttāvapi na padadoṣaḥ, tathā hanprakṛterapīti na padāṃśadoṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:868: (lo, e) ājaghna ityatra na sakalasya padasya parivṛttyasahanam /
GK16visa07cu:870: tathā hi ājaghāna ityukte hanaprakṛtisadbhāve 'pi doṣasyābhāva ityāśaṅkya āha---yathāheti /
GK16visa07cu:880: svamate tu mādhuryaujaḥ prasādākhyāstraya eva guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:882: ājaghne iti padasya doṣaśva padamātragāmīti darśayati---iha tviti /
GK16visa07cu:883: tasyānvayavāyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ tu tadarthakasya ājaghāna ityasya prajahāretyasya ca dānena doṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:887_1: padaikadoṣatāprasaktivāraṇāya ātmanepadapūrvavarttihandhātorapi tathātvamāha---yathehetyādi na padadoṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:892: “bhāti padmaḥ sarovara” ityatroktaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ padmaśabdo 'prayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:894: ādatte iti avācakapadasya śrutikaṭupadāderapi evaṃ nyāyāt padadoṣatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:896: tathāhi----yadi uktanyāyāt aprayuktatvādyanekadoṣāṇāmapi padamātradoṣatvamuktaṃ tatkathaṃ smārārttyandhaḥ ityādiṣu teṣāṃ vākyagatatvamudāhṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:899: atha teṣāmekavākyasthānekapadāvalambitvād vākyadoṣatā udāhṛtā iti cet tadā padamātradoṣatāprayojakatayā darśitanyāyakathanasya pramattagītataiva /
GK16visa07cu:909: deṣāḥ kecit ityādikārikāvākyasya kākākṣi(golaka) nyāyena nirarthaka ityādivākye sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:910: tena nirarthakatva yathā--- “payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ“atra surasindhorityetāvatāpi gatārthatve aṇ pratyayo nirarthakaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:915: nanu “kuñjaṃ hanti kṛśodarī“ityatra han prakṛtereva parivṛttayasahatvādasagarthasya padāṃśaniṣṭatvameva kathaṃ padaniṣṭatvamiti cet /
GK16visa07cu:916: atrocyate asamarthatvasya pṛthak padaniṣṭatvasya prāyeṇādarśanāt prakṛtipratyayau hi svārthabodhakau /
GK16visa07cu:917: ityanādṛtya samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakamiti matamālambya intītyatra padaniṣṭatvamevoktam /
GK16visa07cu:918: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi-- apāsya cyutasaṃskāramasamarthaṃ nirarthakam /
GK16visa07cu:922: ata evālaṅkāre “sunayane ! nayane vidhehī“tyasyāpaunaruktye 'pi lāṭānuprāsa uktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:930: idānīṃ darśitasvasvalakṣaṇānusāreṇaiva uktadoṣāṇāṃ parasparabhedasambhave 'pi bhedāntaramāha--iva śabdānāmiti /
GK16visa07cu:937: (lo, o) sarvathā prayogābhāvaḥ ata eva vākyadoṣamadhye 'gaṇanam /
GK16visa07cu:950: avākacatve dinādayaḥ prakāśamayādyarthe, na tatheti parasparabhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:961: evaṃ padadoṣasajātīyā vākyadoṣā uktāḥ, samprati tadvijātīyā ucyante---
GK16visa07cu:965: pade yo doṣaḥ vākye 'pi tādṛśadoṣasya sattvāt---tatsajātīyatā; tadavṛttestadvijātīyatā /
GK16visa07cu:967: (lo, a) samprati vakṣyamāṇānāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ samanantarebhyo bhedadarśikāṃ kārikāmāha--evamiti /
GK16visa07cu:968: padadoṣāṇāṃ sajātīyāḥ śrutikaṭvādaya ubhayatra varttamānatvād vākyamātragāḥ na punaḥ śrutikaṭvādivat padatadaṃśavākyagāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:988: “ovaṭṭai ullaṭṭai saaṇo kahiṃpi moṭṭāai ṇo parihaṭṭai /
GK16visa07cu:989: hiaeṇa phiṭṭai lajjāi khuṭṭai dihīe sā” //
GK16visa07cu:990: atra ṭakārāḥ śṛṅgārasaparipanthinaḥ kevalaṃ śaktipradarśanāya nibaddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:991: eṣāṃ caikadvitricatuḥ prayoge na tādṛśagrasabhaṅga iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:994: (vi, ba) ovaṭṭa iti---avaluṭhati ulluṭhati, luṭhati, śayane kadāpi /
GK16visa07cu:995: muñcati no parihasati hṛdaye enaṃ paśyati, lajjayā khidyati /
GK16visa07cu:1001: lajjayā paśyati ca diśi diśi khidyati ca ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1007: ovaṭṭai iti---saṃskṛtacchāyā---“apavarttata udvarttate parivarttate śayane kasminnapi /
GK16visa07cu:1008: ramate no vilulitahṛdaye bhraśyati lajjayā truṭyati dhṛtau sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1013: ata eva tathāvidhānāṃ bahuvāraprayoge padadoṣasajātīyo vākyadoṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1029: āhateti---asya tu bahuśaḥ pāta eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1031: (lo, i) evaṃ ḷuptāhataprayogayorapi sakṛdeva prayoge na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1048: viśeṣapratipattyarthamiti---dhanurdharaṇādapyasau na māṃ vārayituṃ śakta ityartho viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1053: kecittvāhuḥ---yatra viśeṣaṇasyāpi kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ sambhavati tatrāpi tatprayogo na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1061: tadāha---kecittviti---atrāpi na yujyata iti prakāśābhiprāyamabuddhvā likhitaṃ vācprayogastu upapattyantarāsattvād yujyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1062: kintu viśeṣaṇadānārthaṃ tatprayoga ityuktireva viśeṣaṇasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasambhavoktyā dūṣitā na tu vācamityasya prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1067: tadupapattistu yathā---vacerdvidhā vuyatpattiḥ kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātaḥ tajjanyaṃ vacanaṃ cārthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1068: tatra vacanārthakatayā prayoge vācamiti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1069: kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātārthakatayā prayoge tu tatkarmabhūtasya vācamityasya yujyata eva prayoga iti /
GK16visa07cu:1082: (vi, ra) nyūnapadatvamāha---yadi mayīti---mama indratayā indratvena tadā kimityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1085: nūnaṃ prastutakāvyapratipādakasya cāsaṃmukhīnasya mahātmana eveti dṛṣṭipātena vakturabhiṣṭapūraṇamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1086: tasyānirddeśena yasya kasyacidapi dṛṣṭapātasūcanena tatpratyāyanamantharamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1091: atra visaśabdasya dhṛtaparisphuṭatatprasūnā iti sarvanāmnaiva parāmarśo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1103: dhṛtavikāśitatkāḥ sainyāḥ senāsamavetajanāḥ visaṃ mṛṇālaṃ jakṣuḥ bubhujire /
GK16visa07cu:1120: idaṃ vṛttamiti dodhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ chanda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1125: ayamāśayaḥ--sāmānyato hāsasya śṛṅgārarasapratikūlyābhāve 'pi tathāvidhamānasthale smaraśaraviṣārdditasya nāyakasyoktau pratikūlateti
GK16visa07cu:1128: yatpādānte laghorapi gurubhāvaḥ uktaḥ, tatsarvatra dvitīyacaturthapādaviṣayam /
GK16visa07cu:1130: atra“pramuditasaurabha āgato vasantaḥ” iti pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1134: kīdṛśaḥ vikasitasahakārabhārasya hārī manohārī parimola yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1141: “anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā sambhārāḥ khalu te 'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā /
GK16visa07cu:1142: śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nigtabasthalāt dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca” //
GK16visa07cu:1146: ratnarohaṇabhuvaḥ prasiddhā eva, guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvastvanyā vilakṣaṇā eva /
GK16visa07cu:1147: evaṃ dhanyā mṛdanyaiva, evaṃ sambhārā api khalvanye /
GK16visa07cu:1148: evaṃ yairarthāt yadguṇaratnamṛdviśeṣasahitaiḥ sambhāraireṣa yuvā vidhinā sṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1149: yatra yūni dṛṣṭe sati mūḍhamanasāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalādastrāṇi mūḍhamanasāṃ strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād vastrāṇi ca patanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1163: “vastrāṇyapi” iti pāṭhe tu dārḍhyamiti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1189: projjvalataḥ jvalanasya jvālāvat vikaṭā sundarī urusaṭānāṃ chaṭā kāntiryasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1190: śvāsenākṣiptāḥ pātitāḥ kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ kulācalā yena tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1204: (lo, ai) bhātīndurityanayorvṛttopagatatvena sandhairna kṛtaḥ, tacca mahākavisamayaviruddham /
GK16visa07cu:1221: (lo, o) marvante--marorante asau urvo iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1225: jaganmā kuru tanvaṅgi ! mānaṃ pādānate priye” //
GK16visa07cu:1234: tṛtīyapāde viśeṣasya kriyānvayena vākyārthasamāptāvapi anākaṅkṣitaviśeṣaṇānvayārthaṃ viśeṣasyāvṛttirūpo 'tra doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1235: atra hi dhvāntanāśanenaiva kṣamātalabhāsanaprāptau tadviśeṣaṇam anākaṅkṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:1236: yatra tu viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣā tiṣṭhati tatra nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1239: ityatra pramāṇādhikatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ vinā prakṛtaśvāsena stanevapathvajananāt śvāsasya pramāṇādhikatva ākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:1245: yāmeṇākṣīṃ vinā prāṇā viphalā me kuto 'dya sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1246: atra yacchabdaniddiṣṭanāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparanirapekṣatvāt tadekāntaḥ pātinā eṇākṣīśabdena anyeṣāṃ sambandhaḥ kaverabhimato nopapadyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1254: yayā eṇākṣyā ityevameṇākṣīviśeṣyako 'nvayaḥ kaverabhipretaḥ sa ca na sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:1261: tathā ca eṇākṣyāmeva sākāṅkṣatvāt tadviśeṣyaka eva /
GK16visa07cu:1262: yā yayetyānayorarthānvayaḥ kaverabhimataḥ sa ca na sambhavatītyāha---ekāntaḥ pātineti /
GK16visa07cu:1264: ekaṃ yatpadaṃ tadantaḥ pātinā tadarthānvayinā eṇākṣīśabdena eṇākṣīśabdārthena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1265: anyeṣāṃ yā yayeti yacchabdārthānāṃ dvayorapyatra bahutvāropād bahuvacanam /
GK16visa07cu:1266: na cātra eṇākṣīmitipadasya vibhaktivyatyayena yā yayetyanayoranvaya iti bācyam,
GK16visa07cu:1271: abhavan, matam, iṣṭam, arthāt kaveḥ yogaḥ sambandho yatra /
GK16visa07cu:1276: “yāṃ vināmī vṛthā prāṇā eṇākṣī sā kṛto 'dya me” /
GK16visa07cu:1277: iti tacchabdanirdiṣṭavākyāntaḥ pātitve 'pi yacchabdaniddiṣṭavākyaiḥ sambandho ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1281: yadi tu tacchabdārthasya viśeṣyatayā eṇākṣīśabdaḥ prayujyate tadādoṣa ityāha---yāṃ vinā me vṛthā iti /
GK16visa07cu:1284: na ca tathāpiṃ bhinnavibhaktikayattatpadārthayoḥ kathamabhedānvaya iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1286: yathā yatra dhūmaḥ sa deśo vāhnimān ityatra tatpadārthānvitasya prathamāntapadārthasya deśasya saptamyantayatpadārthe 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1295: atra yadityasya tadetyanena sambandho na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1299: (vi, ṅa) atra prathamamapi vyatyayamaṅgīkurvataḥ pratyudāharaṇāntaramāha---īkṣase yaditi /
GK16visa07cu:1304: tathā ca yadi kaṭākṣeṇa īkṣase tadā tena kaṭākṣeṇa manobhavaḥ dhanvī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1309: atra vyomakāsāraśabdasya samāse guṇībhāvāttadarthasya na sarvaiḥ saṃyogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1315: atreti---kāsāre rājahaṃsa ityevaṃśamāse tatpuruṣe uttarapadārthasya viśeṣyatvāt kāsāraśabdārthasya viśeṣaṇībhāva eva guṇībhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1317: tathā ca tasya payaḥ pūrādau viśeṣaṇībhāvena anvayāsambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1319: ata eva caitrasya dāsabhāryyā ityatra bhāryyāyaṃ viśeṣaṇasya dāsasya caitraviśeṣyābhāvenānvaye sākāṅkṣataiva /
GK16visa07cu:1324: iha tu pradhānasya kāsārapadārthasya prādhānyenāpratīteḥ sarvo 'pi payaḥ pūrādiśabdārthastadaṅgatayā na pratīyata iti sarvavākyārthavirodhāvabhāsa ityubhayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1329: kintu vidheyasya vidheyatvāpratītyā yadeva vidheyamavimṛṣṭaṃ tadeva duṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1331: uddeśyasambandhitayā vidheyatvāpratītyā uddeśyaghaṭitavākyasyānvayavyatirekād vākyadoṣatvād duṣṭaṃ tu vidheyapadamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1347: atra “bhārgavanindāyāṃ prayuktasya mātṛkaṇṭhacchedanakarttṛtvasya paraśunā sambandho na yuktaḥ” iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1352: vācyārthe vivakṣitasya vyaṅgyārthayogasyāsambhave 'pi kvacidayaṃ doṣa iti kāvyaprakāśakṛnmataṃ dūṣayitumāha---aneneti /
GK16visa07cu:1357: bhārgavasyādhikanindā kartaro adhikaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ dyotayati ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1360: samaya eva karoti bālabalaṃ praṇigadanta itīva śarīriṇām /
GK16visa07cu:1362: atra parāmṛśyamānavākyānantarameveti śabdopayogo yujyate, na tu “praṇigadanta” ityanantaram /
GK16visa07cu:1369: paruṣīkṛtāḥ duḥ śravīkṛtāḥ svarā yeṣāṃ tādṛśa mayūrā yatra kriyāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā śaradiṃ haṃsaravā ramaṇīyatām ayuḥ prāptavantaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1370: kīdṛśāḥ ? śarīriṇāṃ balābalaṃ samaya eva karotīti vinigadantaḥ kathayanta iti /
GK16visa07cu:1371: mayūraravāpekṣayā haṃsaravāṇāmapakṛṣṭatve 'pi śaradiṃ haṃsaravāṇāṃ paruṣīkaraṇāt samayena svarāṇāṃ balābalakaraṇāt śarīriṇāmapi balābalalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1373: atra ca śarīriṇāmapibalābalam iti anvaye kliṣṭatāpi bodhyā /
GK16visa07cu:1376: evaṃ sati praṇigadanta iti padasyāpi anuvādyavākyapraveśaśaṅketyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1379: kalā ca sā kāntimatī kalāvatastvamasya lokasya ca netrakaumudī” //
GK16visa07cu:1384: dūyaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāmiti---tapasyantīṃ pārvatīṃ pratijaṭilaveśasya śivasya svanindāvākyamidam /
GK16visa07cu:1385: candrakalā eva prāk śocanīyā āsīt saṃprati tu tavāpi tathātvād dvayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1386: nindrāpratipādanārthaṃ kapālavattvakathanaṃ kalāyāḥ prārthanā ca tatsamāgamādanumeyā /
GK16visa07cu:1395_0: rāmamanmatheti--sā niśācarī rākṣasī tāḍakā eva niśācarī abhisārikā rāmasya eva manmathasya
GK16visa07cu:1395_1: kandarpasyaiva duḥ sahena śareṇa hṛdaye tāḍitā satī durgandhavad rudhiraṇaiva gandhadravyayuktaraktacandanaiva
GK16visa07cu:1395_2: ukṣitā jīviteśasya yamasyaiva jīviteśasya prāṇeśasya upanāyakasya vasatiṃ gatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1396: atreti---dvitīyor'tho rūpyamāṇaḥ manmathābhisārikādirūpaḥ aniṣṭaḥ anucitaḥ prakṛtavībhatsavirodhiśṛṅgāravyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1398: (lo, u) jīviteśo yamaḥ prāṇeśaśca prakṛto rasaḥ bībhatsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1406: vācyasyānabhidhānamiti---vācyam avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ tasyoccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇa ca anabhidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1410: atra tu vyatikramalavamapīti apikārādhyāhareṇāpi na vivakṣitasiddhiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1412: samāse tadā vyatikramalavaṃ padārthantaramapītyevamva bodhodayādato 'troccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇāvaśyaṃ vācyasyānabhidhānam /
GK16visa07cu:1414: nyūnapadatve vācakapadasyaiva nyūnatā vivakṣitā, apestu na tathātvamityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1420: atra tu na tathā adhyāhārasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1429: caraṇanateti---he caṇḍi ! kopane ! caraṇe ānataḥ kāntaḥ yasyāstasyāstava tathāpi kopa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1432: yadyapīti nirākāṅkṣam eva sambaddhaṃ bhavati tathāpīti tatra dvitīyavākyagatatve eva upapadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1436: iha tu ṅasantaṃ padaṃ vihāyāsīti padaniveśanena ityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1440: atra vacadhātunā prakrāntaṃ prativacanamapi tenaiva vaktumucitam /
GK16visa07cu:1442: evaṃ ca sati na kathitapadatvadoṣaḥ, tasyoddeśyavyatiriktaviṣayakatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1449: atra vacdhātunā uddeśye prativacane 'pi vacdhātunāpi ākāṅkṣā iti darśayati---pratyavocateti /
GK16visa07cu:1450_1: anekavidhāḥ tatra vidhyatayā nirdeśyasya dharmasyaiva punarvidheyatayā ākāṅkṣitasya pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1451: yathatraiva śloke rāvaṇe vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya vacanasya prativacanatvena vidheyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1452: yathā vā--- udeti savitā tāmrastāmra evāstameti ca /
GK16visa07cu:1454: ityatra ekarūpatākathanād udyatsavitari vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya tāmratvasya astasavitaryyapi vidhayatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1455: (2) ekoddeśena vidhyasya vidheyāntare uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1457: ityatra jitendriyatvena vidheyasya vinayakāraṇatvasya śarīrapraviṣṭatayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇaprakarṣavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1459: yathā--te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam /
GK16visa07cu:1461: ityatra siddhārthanivedanavidhau uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā punaḥ pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1473: ityatra hi yadi padāntareṇa sa evārthaḥ pratipādyate tadānyor'tha iva pratibhāsamānaḥ pratītiṃ sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:1478: anyor'tha iveti nāviśiṣṭasyaiva nāmino bodha iti mate tāmraraktaśabdadvarūpaviśeṣaṇabhedād bhedāvabhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1482: tathā ca sati rasānubhavavighna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1487: atra “asmai” itīdamā prakrāntasya tenaiva tatsamānābhyāmetadaḥ śabdābhyāṃ vā parāmarśo yukto na tacchabdena /
GK16visa07cu:1491: ekavidhau uddiṣṭasya vidheyāntare 'pyuddeśyatayā pratinirdeśe prakramabhaṅgamudāharati---te himālayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1497: na caivaṃ tatpadenāpi sarvanāmnā tathaiva parāmarśādadoṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1498: tattu atra asmaiva iti idam śabdena buddhisthapurovarttitayā mahādevaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1499: tacchabdena viprakṛṣṭaparāmarśitayā tasya parāmarśaḥ kartuṃ na śakyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1503: atra “mitā bhūḥ patyāpāṃ sa ca patirapām” iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1507: dharmibhedabhāsakatvena bhedāvabhāsādekoddeśena vidheyasya vidheyāntaroddeśyarūpeṇa pratinirdeśe 'pi taddoṣamudāharati---udanvaditi /
GK16visa07cu:1508: bhūḥ udanvacchinnā sa cāpāṃ patiḥ yojanaśataṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhatīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1509: atra bhuvamuddiśya udanvacchinnatve vidheye udanvānapi vidheyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1510: tasya yojanaśatavyāptividhau uddeśyatayā apāṃpatiśabdena pratinirdeśaḥ kṛta iti doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1521: evavidheye uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśasya pratyayārthasya kramabhaṅgamudāharati---yaśo 'dhigantumiti /
GK16visa07cu:1524: atra nirusukavidhāvuddiṣṭāyā icchāyāstatraiva nirutsukatvavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1547: ghora iti---sambandhaiviśeṣe eva śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ prayoga ityatra kāvyaprakāśakṛduktisamvādamāha--mañjīrādiṣviti /
GK16visa07cu:1558: asthānastheti---yādṛśasthānasattva eva yatpadasya bodhakatā tadbhinnasthānasthatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa07cu:1559: tvamasya lokasya ca ityatra tu uttarapaṭhitaniyatapadasya tathātvamatra tu tanniyamarahitapadasyeti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1560: tīrthe tadīye iti---asya rājño gajaiḥ setubandhāt pratīpagāṃ gaṅgam uttarato tadīye gāṅgīye tīrthe uttaradiśi nabholaṅghanalolapakṣā haṃsā ayatnabālavyajanībabhūvurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1561: setubandhena jalavṛddhyā prāvṛṭkālabuddhyā uttaradiśi mānasarovaragamanārthaṃ haṃsā uḍḍīnā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1566: (lo, e) tadīya ityasya pūrvaṃ gaṅgāmityasya pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1571: atra saṃśṛṇuta ityataḥ pūrvaṃ nañaḥ sthitirucitā /
GK16visa07cu:1572: atra ca padamātrasyāsthāne niveśe 'pi sarvameva vākyaṃ vivakṣitārthapratyāyane mantharamiti vākyadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:1577: yathā---“dvayaṃ gatam-” ityādau tvamityanantaraṃ cakārānupādānādakramatā tathātrāpīti /
GK16visa07cu:1585: hitānna ya iti akramadoṣodāharaṇamiti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati--iha ke 'pīti /
GK16visa07cu:1588: vācakameveti padāntare yogaṃ vinā prayogābhāvena pañcapadaṃ tripadamiti yathā na prayogaḥ tathā naño 'pi pratiyogipadayogaṃ vināprayogāt na tatra vācakatā,
GK16visa07cu:1590: ghaṭādipadasya tu svataḥ prayogāt tatra padatvaṃ nirvivādamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1594: tathā ca asthānasthapadatvodāharaṇaṃ tīrthe tadīye ityevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1597: “adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigati krodhādivālohitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1598: prodyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇā tphullatkairavakoṣaniḥ saradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇāṃ śaśī” //
GK16visa07cu:1599: atra kopina uktau samāso na kṛtaḥ, kaveruktau kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1605_1: niḥ saratām alīnāṃ śreṇībhūtaṃ kṛpāṇāṃ dūrataraṃ prasāritaḥ karo raśmireva tādṛśo
GK16visa07cu:1605_2: hasto yena tādṛśaḥ san tatkṣaṇāt karṣaṇe 'pi hastasya dūre prasāraṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:1616: atra nabho 'ṅgane candraṃ paśya mānaṃ muñceti yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:1621: vadāmi sakhi ! tattvaṃ te kadācinnocitāḥ krudhaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1629: ramaṇe iti---atra ramaṇe caraṇaprāntapatite satyadhunā krodho nocita iti vākyasya madhye vadāmi sakhi te tattvamiti vākyamanupraviṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:1655: “vilokya vitate vyomni vidhuṃ muñca ruṣaṃ priye !” atra vitataśabdo mānatyāgaṃ prati na kiñcidupakurute /
GK16visa07cu:1656: adhikapadatve padārthānvayapratīteḥ samakālameva bādhapratibhāsaḥ, iha tu paścāditi viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1662: pallavākṛtiraktoṣṭhītyatra hyākṛtiśabdasya niṣprayojanatvarūpo bādho 'nvayabodhasamakālameva pratibhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1671: “dehi me vājinaṃ rājan ! gajendraṃ vā madālasam” /
GK16visa07cu:1695: tatra pragapakarṣe udāharati harantīti--iyaṃ lokalocanacandrikāsurūpā tanvī yauryuvabhirvokṣate teṣāṃ yūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ navendukalādayo na harantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1696: atra ādipadāccandrikāpi ninditā, tanvyāṃ tadāropādutkarṣaḥ pratipāditastadāha---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:1697: prāgutkarṣe tu yathā---“tava karṇandunā tanvi ! nabhasīndustiraskṛtaḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:1701: yathāśu jāyate pāto na tathā punarunnatiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1707: stabdhasya bhadrābhadrāvivecinaḥ vivaraṃ parasya cchidraṃ tatra icchāmātraṃ natu pravṛttau tadapekṣā stabdhatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1710: “varṣatyetadaharpatirna tu ghano dhāmasthāmacchaṃ payaḥ satyaṃ sā savituḥ sutā surasaritpūro yathā plāvitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1712: śraddhā na kasya śrutau na pratyeti tathāpi mugdhahariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣvapaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1716_0: varṣatīti--kasyāścit kāminyāḥ kāntadūtīḥ prati anyāpadeśena sotkaṇṭhavacanamidam---ahaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1716_1: patiḥ sūryyo dhāmasthaṃ svīyaraśmistham etad dṛśyāmānaṃ payo varṣati natu ghano varṣati
GK16visa07cu:1717: tathā yayā surasarito gaṅgāyāḥ pūraḥ pravāhaḥ plāvitaḥ sā arthāt yamunāsavituḥ sūryyasya satyaṃ sutā /
GK16visa07cu:1718: kathametanniścitam ityatrāha---vyāsasyeti---vṛṣṭiyamunayoḥ sūryyaprabhavatvaṃ na khalu kenacidanāptenoktaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:1722: evaṃrūpāsu kālindyāḥ sūryyakanyātvabodhikāsu ca vyāsoktiṣu ko jano na viśvasiti kasya janasyā vā evamarthikāyāṃ śrutau vede na śraddhā ?
GK16visa07cu:1723: api pu sarva eva viśvasiti sarvasya ca śraddhā;
GK16visa07cu:1724: tathā ca hariṇyā api tatra viśvāsaśraddhaucityameva /
GK16visa07cu:1725: tathāpi mugdhā mūḍhā hariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣu adhikaraṇeṣu jalaṃ na pratyeti /
GK16visa07cu:1726: dhāmasthamacchaṃ paya ityanena payasaḥ sūryyamarīcivṛttitayā vyāsaśrutibhyāṃ bodhitatvena tathā pratyayocityāt /
GK16visa07cu:1733: atra prakṛṣṭataraḥ prakṛtoyamarthaḥ-sa nāgaraḥ satyavāgiti prāmāṇikamevedam /
GK16visa07cu:1734: tasya dūtīnāṃ bhavatīnāṃ vāci satyapratyayo yujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1736: kṛgīṇāṃ marumarīcikāsu jalapratyayo yathā, mamāpi bhavatīṣu saṃpratyayastathaiva /

GK16visa07cu:2759: svayaṃ vāpi parāmarśe iti kārikāpādastatrāpratītatvaṃ guṇa iti pūrvoktamanusañjayati---apratītatvamiti /
GK16visa07cu:2760: yuktaḥ kalābhiriti--taṃ paramātmasvarūpaṃ candraṃ pariśīlayāmi satataṃ bhāvayāmi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2763: kālābhaiḥ śarīraparigrahecchārūpābhiḥ kalābhiḥ dharmaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ san yastamasāṃ śarīrātmanorabhedābodharūpāṇāṃ mohānāṃ vivṛddhyai bhavati yathā rāmaśarīraparigrahe /
GK16visa07cu:2764: anyacandrastu svīyaṣoḍaśāṃśarūpābhiḥ kalābhiryuktaḥ san tamasāmandhakāraṇāṃ kṣataye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2765: tathā tābhiḥ kalābhaiḥ hīnaḥ sanneṣāṃ tamasāṃ kṣataye bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2766: agṛhītaśarīratvena tādṛśamohābhāvāt, anyacandrastu kalāhīnaḥ san tamovivṛddhye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2767: tamonāśakakalābhāvena tasya tamo vṛddhīṃ prati yatsattve 'grimakṣaṇe yasya sattvaṃ yadasattve 'grimakṣaṇe yadasattvaṃ tattasya kāraṇamityevaṃrūpakāraṇatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2770: atra kalātamaḥ padārthau apratītāvapi svayaṃ parāmarśe guṇau parāpratīteruddeśyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2772: (lo, o) kalābhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ, tāśca ekādaśendriyāṇi, pañca tanmābhāṇi /
GK16visa07cu:2793: udayasavituruddeśe vihitasya tāmratvasya astamayasavituruddeśenāpi vidheyatayā pratinirdeśarūpo 'nuvāda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2795: “hanta ! hanta ! gataḥ kānto vasante sakhi ! nāgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:2827: dvyarthatvena tadyogyatā--viśeṣyadvayer'thadvayāttu niścaya eva tathā padārthamāha---guṇa eveti /
GK16visa07cu:2830: āvayoḥ sadanaṃ samprati samaṃ, tvatto dhanalābhe tupaścāt samaṃ na bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2831: pṛthūni kārttasvarasya suvarṇasya pātrāṇi yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2832: pṛthukānāṃ śiśūnām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ daridrasadanaṃ bhakṣyābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2833: bhūṣitāḥ suvarṇadimāṇḍitāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanāḥ yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2834: bhuvi uṣitāḥ suptāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanā yatra daridrasadanaṃ tādṛśaṃ śayyāvirahāt /
GK16visa07cu:2836: vilasatkā bile tiṣṭhanto mūṣikapipīllikādayasteṣāṃ reṇubhiḥ gahanaṃ daridrasadanam /
GK16visa07cu:2841: (lo, au) pṛthviti---pṛthukānāṃ balānām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ sthānam /
GK16visa07cu:2844: vilasantaḥ tiṣṭhanta eva vilasatkā reṇavo dhūlayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2860: dīdhīvevīṅ iti kaścijjano guṇavṛddhyorabhājanaṃ guṇavṛddhyā ca hīna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2861: dīdhīvevīṅ dhātvoriḍāgamasya ca samastayorapi guṇasya tadvādhikāyā vṛddheścābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2863: yatra jane sannihite sati tatsannihitasyāpi na te guṇavṛddhī,
GK16visa07cu:2872: kvippratyayanibhaḥ kvipaḥ sarvāpahārīti lopād ripoḥ sarvanāśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2873: atra na kevalaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ kaṣṭatvaṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2884: he upādhyāya ! atra loke tvāmahaṃ kadācana na atārpsam /
GK16visa07cu:2886: asya vaiyākaraṇasya vaktṛtve kaṣṭatvaṃ duḥ śravatvamapi guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2893: ede assasamohā paḍanti āsāsu duddhadhāra vva” //
GK16visa07cu:2901: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patīnti āśāsu dugdhadhārā iva //
GK16visa07cu:2904: hyo godohodbhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ haiyaṅgavīna bhakṣyalampaṭasyoktau bhakṣyadravyadṛṣṭānto 'tra gramyo guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2907: eso iti--- “eṣaḥ śaśadharabimbo dṛśyate haiyaṅgavīnapiṇḍa iva /
GK16visa07cu:2908: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patantyāśāsu dugdhadhārā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2910: nirhetutā tu khyāter'the doṣatāṃ naiva gacchati /
GK16visa07cu:2912: kavīnāṃ samaye khyāte guṇaḥ khyātaviruddhatā // VisSd_7.22 //
GK16visa07cu:2915: yaśasi dhavalatā varṇyate hāsakīrtyoḥ raktau ca krodharāgau; saridudadhigataṃ paṅkajendīvarādi /
GK16visa07cu:2916: toyādhāre 'khile 'pi prasarati ca marālādikaḥ pakṣisaṅgho jyotsnā peyā cakorairjaladharasamaye mānasaṃ yānti haṃsāḥ // VisSd_7.23 //
GK16visa07cu:2923: satkarmaṇā kīrtiḥ, dāne ca yaśa iti yaśakīrttyorbhedaḥ, marālo haṃsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2925: pādāghātādaśokaṃ vikasati bakulaṃ yoṣitāmāsyamadyair- yūnāmaṅgeṣu hārāḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2927: maurvīrolambamālā dhanuratha viśikhāḥ kausumāḥ puṣpaketo- rbhinnaṃ syādasya bāṇairyuvajanahṛdayaṃ strīkaṭākṣeṇa tadvat // VisSd_7.24 //
GK16visa07cu:2932: (lo, i) hāro hṛdayaṃ ca sphuṭatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2938: candrikā śuklapakṣe meghadhvāneṣu nṛtyaṃ bhavati ca śikhināṃ nāpyaśoke phalaṃ syāt /
GK16visa07cu:2940: na ca kusumaphale gandhasāradrumāṇā- mityādyunneyamanyatkavisamayagataṃ satkavīnāṃ prabandhe // VisSd_7.25 //
GK16visa07cu:2945: atra jyāśabdenāpi gatārthatve dhanuḥ śabdena jyāyā dhanuṣyāyattīkaraṇaṃ bodhyate /
GK16visa07cu:2961: tadvodhaśca dhanuḥ śabdādau dhanurārūḍhatvaṃ lakṣaṇayā rūḍhihetukayā luptaṣaṣṭyartho vā ārūḍhatvam /
GK16visa07cu:2962: gatārthatvepīti--na ca jyāśabdārthaḥ kathaṃ dhanurjyātvasya saṃsthānaviśeṣavyaṅgyajātiviśeṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2963: jyātvasya jātitve 'pi tatsambandhino dhanuṣo namayataḥ smārakatvena tadvaśādeva dhanurlābhe,
GK16visa07cu:2965_1: na caivaṃ karṇasthaitalakṣaṇāyāmapi karṇasthitakarṇabhūṣā iti bodhanenaiva punaruktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2967: evaṃ śravaṇeti--etaddvaye padādhikyasyaiva prasāktiḥ kuṇḍalatvakirīṭatvayoḥ saṃsthānavyaṅgyajātitvādeva /
GK16visa07cu:2969: evaṃ nirupapado mālāśabdaḥ puṣpastrajamevābhidhatta iti sthitāvapi “puṣpamālāvibhāti te” /
GK16visa07cu:2976: utkṛṣṭapuṣpaprasiddhyai iti puṣpāṃśo mālāśabdārtha eva puṣpaśabdasya tu utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2979: muktāṃśo 'pi hāraśabdārtha eva ityato 'trāpi punaruktereva prasiktiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2983: dhanurjyādayaḥ satkāvyasthitā eva nibaddhavyāḥ, na tvasthitā jaghanakāñjīkarakaṅkaṇādayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2986: (vi, ca) satkāvyasthitā eveti---yataḥ satkāvye sthitā ato nibaddhavyā evetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2993: mā mā mānada ! māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim” //
GK16visa07cu:2998: gāṭhāliṅganena vāmanīkṛtakucā cāsau prodbhinnaromodramā ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3000: sāndrasneharasātirekeṇa vigalat śrīmato nitambādambaraṃ yasyāstādṛśaviśeṣaṇadvayavatī sā mama nāyikā pīḍayetyanuktivaśāt,
GK16visa07cu:3001: he mānada ! māṃ mā mā mā ityalimityevamalakṣarollāpinī satī suptetyādivitarkacatuṣṭayaviṣayo 'bhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3003: manogatatvena manasi layavitarkaḥ manasoradyāpi abahirbhāvāt atyantalayarūpasya vilayasya vitarkaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3006: kim ? uktarūpā priyā mama manasi suptā nu ! sthiratayā varttamānatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:3007: suptāpi punarutthāya pātītyāśaṅkyāha mṛtā nu kim ?
GK16visa07cu:3010: tathābhūtāpi kenacid vyāvarttayituṃ śakyetetyata āhavilīneti--dugdhre jalavat sarvathā bhedopalambhābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3013: etatpratipādikāyā nāyikāyāḥ sāndrānandajaḍībhūtatayā saṅkīrṇavākyoccāraṇe 'pyasāmarthyaṃ vyanaktīti nyūnapadatvaṃ guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3019: “tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3020: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayorjāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3024: sā urvaśī svaprabhāvena pihitā adṛśyā tiṣṭhaditi vitarkyāha--dīrghaṃ na sā iti evaṃ svargāya iti vitarkyāha---mayi punariti /
GK16visa07cu:3025: asyā asureṇa haraṇakoṭistu asambhavyā ityāha---tāṃ hartumiti /
GK16visa07cu:3027: ato 'darśane hetvabhāvāna vismayādāha---sā ceti---agocaram agocaratvaṃ yātā prāptā /
GK16visa07cu:3029: atra prabhāvapihitetiṃ bhavediti cetyanantaraṃ “naitadyataḥ” iti padāni nyūnāni /
GK16visa07cu:3031: “dīrghaṃ na se” tyādivākyajanyayā ca pratipattyā tiṣṭhedityādivākyapratipatterbodhaḥ sphuṭamevāvabhāsata iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3035: atreti---pūrvoktasya niṣedhaṃ pratyeva dīrghaṃ na sā ityanayoḥ hetutvāt natu pūrvapratītiṃ prati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3036: nanūtkarṣasyākaraṇāt mā bhavatu guṇatvaṃ, doṣatvaṃ tu syādityata āha--dīrghaṃ na setyādīti /
GK16visa07cu:3038: tathā ca “naitadyataḥ“ityasyākāṅkṣāvaśādadhyāhāro 'pi na doṣāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3041: prabhāvena divyena pihitā, adṛśyā sā urvaśī /
GK16visa07cu:3048: tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām” //
GK16visa07cu:3057: (vi, ña) guṇaḥ kvāpīti---yatrādhikapadasya rūḍhilakṣaṇayā arthāntaraṃ tatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3058: ācāratīti---manaso 'pyagocarānarthāt asadarthān sahasā yat durjana ācarati tadahaṃ na na jāne /
GK16visa07cu:3059: api tvahameva jāne ityarthaḥ, kintu mama bhanaḥ niṣṭhuratāṃ naiva spṛśati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3063: samāptapunarā ttatvaṃ na doṣo na guṇaḥ kvacit /
GK16visa07cu:3066: evaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamātrasya punarupādāne samāptapunarāttatvaṃ na vākyāntarasyeti vijñeyam /
GK16visa07cu:3070: anyastā ityatra pūrvārddhena vākyasamāptāvapi kathamatra niṣpādakaguṇaratnādīnāṃ vailakṣaṇyamityākāṅkṣotthānādadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:3073: viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣāsattve tu na doṣa iti prāgeva darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:3075: na vākyatvaviśeṣaṇatvayoriti sthitena vākyāntarasyeti yaduktaṃ tadvākyāntare ākāṅkṣā avaśyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyabhiprāyeṇaiva /
GK16visa07cu:3084: “diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñjitāḥ paśyata /
GK16visa07cu:3085: viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmātprādurabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ matam” //
GK16visa07cu:3086: atra vadanta evetyādi vākyaṃ vākyāntarapraveśāt camatkārātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16visa07cu:3091: tathā ca diṅmātaṅgaghaṭābhirvibhaktāścatvāraḥ paryantāḥ yasyāḥ tādṛśī mahī yena rāmeṇa sādhyate /
GK16visa07cu:3092: siddhā vyāghātaśūnyasādhanena svavaśīkṛtā sāpi mahī viprāya pratipādyate /
GK16visa07cu:3094: tasmai rāmāya nama idaṃ kāthādbhutaṃ yasmāt prādurabhūt anyairatathākāraṇāt yasmādeva prādurabhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3096: kenāpyutrakālaṃ tathākaraṇādastaṃ gatamityevaṃ vadanta eva vayaṃ romāñcitā eva idaṃ paśyatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3110: uttaṃsayiṣyati kacāṃstava devi ! bhīma ityatra sukumāratayā varṇānāmasamāsena ca sukumāratayetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3127: vibhāvānubhāvakṛteti---vyabhicāribhāvasya yau vibhāvānubhāvau tābhyāṃ vyaṅgyatvarūpāyā vyabhicāribhāvasya puṣṭistadrāhityamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3131: “autsukyena kṛtasvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnotābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3132: dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave sahgame saṃhohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3136: gaurī nave saṃgame prathamadine harasānnidhyanimittamautsukyena kṛtatvārānantaraṃ ca sahabhuvā sāhajikayā hriyā vyāvarttamānā tataśca taistairityādi /
GK16visa07cu:3137: tataśca varaṃ svāminaṃ haram agre dṛṣṭvā āttasādhvasarūparasā,
GK16visa07cu:3138: tataśca hasatā hareṇaśliṣṭā satī saṃrohatpulakā īdṛśī vaḥ śivāyāstu /
GK16visa07cu:3144_1: yathā lajjādipratipādranaṃ tathā sahasā prasāraṇarūpānubhāvamukhena autsukyasya pratipādane
GK16visa07cu:3146: atrautsukyasya tvarārūpānubhāvamukhena pratipādane saṅgame na jhaṭiti pratītiḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3155: evaṃ hriyo 'pyanubhāvavyāvarttanāt na jhaṭiti tatpratītiḥ ityataḥ tasyāpi hriyeti śabdasya vācyatvaṃ na doṣa ityāha---hriyo 'nubhāvasya ceti /
GK16visa07cu:3157: sādhvasaṃ bhayaṃ hāsaśca hāsyahetuścetovikāsaḥ sthāyibhāvalakṣaṇe darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3158: taddvayaṃ ca bhayānakahāsyarasayoḥ sthāyibhāvāvapi gauramaheśayoḥ śṛṅgare 'tra vyabhicārabhāvau /
GK16visa07cu:3162_0: maheśahāsaścoddīpanavibhāvastataśca sādhvasahāsāvanupādāya yadi sakampā iti kriyeta
GK16visa07cu:3162_1: tadā tadaṅgasarpadarśanāt bhayena ārdragajacarmakapāladarśanāt jugupsayā ca śṛṅgārapratikūlābhyāṃ
GK16visa07cu:3162_2: tatkampasambhavāt na śṛṅgāravyabhicāriṇoḥ sādhvasahāsayoreva vyañjanā syāt,
GK16visa07cu:3171: yathā--“kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam-” ityādi /
GK16visa07cu:3177: viruddharasīyasyāpi tasya balavatā bādhyasya bādhyatvena kathanaṃ virodhino jaye yathātathā guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3184: kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyatyanena vyaṅgyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3186: virādhino 'pi smaraṇo sāmyena vacane 'pi vā // VisSd_7.30 //
GK16visa07cu:3191: virodhino 'pi iti---virodhirasasyāpi sañcāryyādeḥ smaraṇi smaryyamāṇatvena vyañjitasya vacane sāmyena vathane 'pi prakṛtarasena saha na virodho bhavet /
GK16visa07cu:3196: atrālambanavicchede raterarasātmatayā smaryamāṇānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ śokoddīpakatayā kuṇānukūlatā /
GK16visa07cu:3211: nṛpā ruṣā bhejire prapedire priyatamayā iva /
GK16visa07cu:3215: strutaṃ kṣaritaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ rājñāṃ yataḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3217: strutaṃ niḥ sṛtaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ gātrāt yasyāstādṛśyā priyatamayā /
GK16visa07cu:3222: priyatamayā tu svīyakarāhatyā pṛthoḥ svorudeśarūpasya pīṭhasya dhvananam /
GK16visa07cu:3233_0: ekasasthāyibhāvo 'pi anyarase vyabhicāribhāva ityato raudrasasthāyibhāvaḥ krodho
GK16visa07cu:3234: nanu priyatamayā iva ityuktyā priyatamaiva sāmyena vivakṣitā,
GK16visa07cu:3243: “ekaṃ dhyānimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare sambhogabhāvālasam /
GK16visa07cu:3249: samādhisamaye vibhinnarasaṃ śambhoḥ netratrayaṃ vaḥ pātu /
GK16visa07cu:3259: dūre vikṛṣṭacāpo yo madanaḥ tadviṣaye krodhānalenoddīpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3260: atra raudrarasasthāyibhāvasya krodhasya vācyatve 'pyuddīpanena tadanubhāvena punarvyañjanā aparāṅgatetyāha---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:3265: atra śānteti---aṅgino bhagavadviṣayaratibhāvasya aṅgabhāvena viruddhānāmapi śāntādīnāṃ nānyo 'nyavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3268: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3269: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3273: itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /
GK16visa07cu:3274: tripurudāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirvo duritaṃ dahatu /
GK16visa07cu:3275: kīdṛśaḥ hastāvalagnaḥ san sāśrunetrotpalābhistripurayuvatibhirārdraparādhaḥ kāmīva kṣiptaḥ evamaṃśukasyāntamādadāno 'pi abhihataḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3278: kāmipakṣe---cumbanārthaṃ keśagrahaṇaṃ tathā caraṇanipātato 'gniḥ sambhrameṇa bhayena nekṣitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3279: kāmī tu caraṇanipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇādareṇa yat īkṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3284: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo 'ṅgam /
GK16visa07cu:3286: evaṃ cāviśrāntidhāmatayā karuṇasyāpyaṅgataiveti dvayorapi karuṇaśṛṅgārayorbhagavadutsāhaparipuṣṭatadviṣayaratibhāvāsvādaprakaṣrakatayā yaugapadyasambhāvādaṅgatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3289: (vi, ma) kavigatā kaviniṣṭhā pradhānam, sa dahatu ityādi nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvāt ṣa tasyāśceti /
GK16visa07cu:3295: sa cātra vyaṅgya ityato vīrarasa evātra pradhānam /
GK16visa07cu:3296: tat kathaṃ ratibhāvasya prādhānyamuktam ityata āha---tasya cāparipuṣṭatayā iti /
GK16visa07cu:3297: tasyotsāhasya sākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvena dahatviti nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyakavibhāvāṅgatvenāprādhānyarūpayā aparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmanāptatayā bhāvamātrasya sthāyibhāvasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3304: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ cāviśrāntīti /
GK16visa07cu:3306: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3308: smaryyamāṇasya vibhāvādisāmyasya vivakṣādhīnavivakṣitasāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktāvapi na virodhaityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3317: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān /
GK16visa07cu:3318: tāsveva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnistathā ceṣṭitavāniti sādṛśyasaṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇenerṣyavipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3321: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ?
GK16visa07cu:3326_2: rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena smaryamāṇena vivakṣitasāmyena vā rasena saha kathaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3330: tulyabalatvābhāvena pradhānabhūtena nirākāṅkṣavidheyavākyena vyaṅgyatayā pradhānena aṅhirasena balavatā smaryamāṇopamānayoreva upamardanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3331: na cāyaṃ sa rasanotkarṣotyādau nirākāṅkṣavākyaireva smaryamāṇaśṛṅgāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3333: teṣāṃ vidheyapātityaṃ tu karuṇavyañjakameva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgyatve 'pi parokṣatvādeva smaryamāṇatopacāra iti bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:3343: kṣipta ityādivākyānāṃ kāmīva ityādivākyasya canirākāṅkṣatvena tadvyaṅgyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3346: (lo, i) nanu samūhetyādi--yadi rasayorvirodhaḥ syāt, yadi vā aṅgāṅgi bhāvaḥ syāt /
GK16visa07cu:3361: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
GK16visa07cu:3366: ekavākyavyaṅgyatvābhāve 'pi dvayornirākaṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatve 'pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇāpratītyā virodhāprasaktirastyeva /
GK16visa07cu:3367: kintu smaryamāṇaśṛṅgārapekṣayā anubhūyamānasyopamānaśṛṅgārāpekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantikapratītiviṣayatayā prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3368: evaṃ karuṇāpekṣayā bhagavati kavibhāvasya ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatvena prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3369_0: ityataḥ tādṛśapradhānetareṣu karuṇetaratra śṛṅgāre bhāvetaratra karuṇe ślokāntare
GK16visa07cu:3386: ekapadyabodhyatārūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasāntare aṅgaprakarṣakaṃ syāttadā bādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3390: atathābhūtasya ca bādhyatvaṃ svaṇḍarasatvaṃ ca ityuktam /
GK16visa07cu:3393: yadyaṅgī rasaḥ aparipuṣṭatayā bhāvamātravailakṣaṇyenāpātatamātrataḥ prādhānyenābhivyaktaḥ samagraṃ nāsvādyata iti pastantratvāt,
GK16visa07cu:3401_0: yatra tu kapole jānakyā ityatra vilodhinoḥ śṛṅgāravīrarasayornedṛśo bādhyabādhakabhāvastatra
GK16visa07cu:3401_1: tayoḥ kathaṃ sanniveśa ityāśaṅkya tu vīraśṛṅgārayorvirodhaṃ paroktaṃ darśayati---nanvādya iti /
GK16visa07cu:3403: ityuktanayena viruddhayoḥ kathamekatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3409: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3414: ślokārthastu raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyā vaktrakamalaṃ muhuḥ paśyan kharadūṣaṇādirajanicarasenākalakalaṃ śṛṇvān jaṭājūṭasya jaṭāsamūhasya granthiṃ draḍhayati /
GK16visa07cu:3415_0: vaktrakamalaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi kapole smareṇajānakīniṣṭhena rāmaviṣayakasmareṇa
GK16visa07cu:3415_1: smeraḥ harṣaprāyaḥ sphārī vistṛtaḥ uḍḍāmaro bāhulyāt udbhaṭaḥ pulako yasya tādṛśaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3417: jaṭājuṭadraḍhanavyaṅgyo vīrarasaśca parasparamabādhyatam anaṅgatāṃ cāpannau svātantryeṇa upalabhyeti /
GK16visa07cu:3420: atrocyate---iha khalu rasānāṃ virodhitāyā avirodhitāyāśca tridhā vyavasthā /
GK16visa07cu:3434: tridhāpyālambanetyādinā kapole jānakyā ityādau bhinne ālambane vīrasya rajanīcarasenā,
GK16visa07cu:3437: evaṃ ca vīrasya nāyakaniṣṭhatvena bhayānakasya pratināyakaniṣṭhatvena nibandhe bhinānaśrayatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3442: rajanīcarālambanakastu vīrarasa ityavirodha iti samādhāsyan āha---atrecyate /
GK16visa07cu:3445: tatra yasya yena saha vilodhastaṃ darśayati---tatra vīraśṛṅgārayoriti /
GK16visa07cu:3449: yathā mama---prauḍhāmādāya bhītiṃ manasi sarabhasaṃ prāpya lokāpakīrtiṃ naiva stokāpyapekṣākriyata pathi pathi prāktanāsu priyāsu /
GK16visa07cu:3450: śrīmanniḥ śaṅkabhānoḥ samaraparisaradbhīmmaniḥ sīmasenā- niḥ śāṇasvānaśaṅkākulamapasaratāṃ pañcagauḍeśvereṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3453: yaśca nāgānande praśamāśrayasyāpi jīmūtavāhanasya malayavatyanurāgo darśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3454: tatra “aho gītamaho vāditram” ityadbhutasyāntarā niveśanānnairantaryābhāvānna śāntaśṛṅgārayorvirodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3459: nanu śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryye virodhaścet kathaṃ nāgānande na tathā nibaddhamityata āha---yattviti /
GK16visa07cu:3463: (lo, ḷ) śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryyavirodhinorna paraṃ prabandhe yāvadekasminnapi vākye virādhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3465: saśoṇitaiḥ kavyabhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ pakṣaiḥ khagānāmupavījyamānān saṃvījitāścandanavārisekaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ kalpalatādukūlaiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3466: vimānaparyyaṅkatale niṣaṇṇāḥ kutūhalāviṣṭatayā tadānīm nirddiśyamānān lalanāṅgulibhirvorāḥ svadehān patitānapaśyan /
GK16visa07cu:3470: “pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vadanam-” ityādau ca pāṇḍutādīnāmaṅgabhāvaḥ karuṇavipralambhe 'pīti na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3474: nanu paripanthirasāṅgasya vibhāvādeḥ parigraho doṣa ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3475: tatkatham “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3477: “ityādau śṛṅgārasīye mālatīmādhavīye śloke śṛṅgāraparipanthikaruṇānubhāvasya vadanapāṇḍutādeḥ sattve 'pi aduṣṭatānubhava ityata āha---pāṇḍu kṣāmam iti /
GK16visa07cu:3479: he sakhi ! tava pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre 'cikitsyaṃ rogamāvedayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3483: ubhayīyatve tu prakaraṇasācivyāt prakṛtasabodhāt na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3486: yadi khalu pāṇḍutvādīnāṃ vipralambhāpekṣayādhikā karuṇāṅgatā bhavet tadaiva doṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3489: anukāre ca sarveṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ naiva doṣatā // VisSd_7.31 //
GK16visa07cu:3501: adoṣatā ca guṇatā jñeyā cānubhayātmatā // VisSd_7.32 //
GK16visa07cu:3505: (vi, ga) ityaucityāt evam aucityāt, adoṣatā guṇatā iti /
GK16visa07cu:3509: doṣatāguṇatayorvyātireko hi na doṣatā na guṇatā /
GK16visa07cu:3518: iti sāhityadarpaṇe doṣanirūpaṇo nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
